summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Superintendent of Lighting and Water Works to construct a cast iron feeder main from Western Avenue and Union Street, along Union Street to Ninth Avenue, and along Hubbel Place, from Ninth Avenue to Terry Avenue and Pike Street; thence along Pike Street to Melrose Avenue; thence along Melrose Avenue to East Pine Street; thence along East Pine Street to Harvard Avenue, and appropriating money therefore.
